A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Disney...wtf?  Have you people never seen a Star Wars movie before?  I cannot believe how bad this movie is!!

My expectations weren't high...I guess you could say I had a bad feeling about this movie (and where was that line in this film??).

I had no idea I would leave a Star Wars movie feeling as empty as I did.  Really\, not trying to be dramatic but it is that bad.  Maybe worse.

My husband hated it.  The friends we went with hated it.  The kids with us hated it.  Not sure who Disney was trying to appeal to...liberal\, man-hating\, socialistic vegans?

I want my SW back!  Fine\, the old characters have had their day\, I can accept that.   I like Rey\, Kylo\, Finn and Poe but they didn't even seem to move in this movie.  Instead we got Rose (please\, don't come back in the next installment!) and Benecio Del Toro\, whom I liked\, but even he seemed like a shadow in this movie and then was gone.

I don't know how this can be redeemed if at all.  Please\, give a redo and all will be forgiven.  If you continue this way\, you can count this fan done.
